item.name: Anchor of Seafaring
entries: 这个物品由一个2英尺长的中央铁杆组成，上面有一个横梁，底部有两根弯曲的铁条。它上面连接着一根4英尺长的结实粗糙的绳子。当将锚系在船只上并扔入水中时，你可以使用一个动作来说出锚的口令。绳子会神奇地延长，直到锚触底或绳子达到最大长度1英里。如果你再次说出口令，绳子会缩短回原来的长度。

item.name: Anklet of Hobbling
entries: 当这条精致的黄金链环绕在生物的脚踝上时，该生物的速度减半。只有当生物是{@condition incapacitated}时，才能将脚镯戴在不情愿的生物身上。
当你使用这个脚环时，你和你指定的任何生物可以使用一个动作来移除它。每10天一次，被绑定的生物可以进行一次 {@dc 20} 力量 ({@skill Athletics}) 检定。成功时，生物挣脱并摧毁脚环。
长时间让生物跛行可能导致永久性伤害，实际上是一种酷刑。我很难想到平衡受益于无端残忍的情况。

item.name: Anklet of Levitation
entries: 当你戴上这个脚镯时，你可以使用一个动作在自己身上施放{@spell levitate}法术。一旦使用，直到第二天黎明前，这个脚镯的这个特性就无法再次使用。

item.name: Anklet of Walking
entries: 佩戴这个脚镯时，你可以站在任何液体表面上并像站在实地上一样移动。

item.name: Aquamarine of Spell Extending
item.reqAttune: by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard
entries: 这块蓝色石头被雕刻成鹤的形状，拥有3个充能。当你握着它时，你可以使用一个奖励动作来消耗一个充能，并且将任何施放时间至少为1分钟的6级或更低级别法术的持续时间加倍。这块海蓝宝石每天黎明时恢复所有已消耗的充能。

item.name: Armband of Healing
entries: 这只铜臂环上刻有两只雄鹿围绕着一根权杖的徽记。佩戴这个臂环时，你施放的任何治疗法术都会治愈最大数量的生命值。一旦使用，臂环的这个属性直到次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

item.name: Armband of Strength
entries: 这只厚重的青铜臂环上雕刻着两只公牛对撞角的图像。佩戴此物时，你的力量得分为20。如果你的力量在没有佩戴它的情况下已经达到或超过20，则它对你没有任何影响。

item.name: Armored Gi
entries: 这件物品由一件白色棉质夹克和加固裤子以及一条厚重的黑色棉质腰带组成。如果你不穿盔甲并且不使用盾牌，穿上这套道袍后，你将获得+1的AC和豁免投掷奖励。

item.name: Badge of Freedom
entries: 这枚银质徽章边缘镀金，形状像一对微小的翅膀。佩戴时，魔法既不能减慢你的速度，也不能使你成为{@condition paralyzed}或{@condition restrained}。

item.name: Badge of Valor
entries: 这枚金徽章上刻有一只狮子头，周围环绕着一圈海蓝宝石。佩戴它时，你周围20英尺内的每个友好生物（包括你自己）在对抗被 {@condition frightened} 时获得优势。

item.name: Bag of Flame
entries: 这个麻袋是火红色的，摸起来感觉很烫。这个袋子有3个次数，用于以下属性。它每天在黎明时恢复{@dice 1d3}已用次数。

entries.name: Flame Sheet
entries: 你可以使用一个动作打开袋子，并消耗1个充能，使一层薄薄的火焰射出。在一个15英尺锥形范围内的每个生物必须进行一次{@dc 15} 敏捷豁免。在豁免失败时，生物会受到{@damage 3d6} 火焰伤害，豁免成功时则受到一半伤害。火焰会点燃该区域内未被穿戴或携带的可燃物品。

entries.name: Summon Fire Snake
entries: 你可以使用一个动作伸手进入袋子，消耗2点能量来取出一个{@creature fire snake|MM}。这个生物对你和你的同伴友好。为这个生物投掷先攻骰，它有自己的回合。它会遵从你发出的口头命令（你不需要采取任何行动）。如果你不给{@creature fire snake|MM}下任何命令，它会保护自己免受敌对生物的伤害，但不会采取其他行动。

entries.name: Fiery Shield
entries: 你可以使用一个动作打开袋子，消耗3个充能，让薄弱的火焰从你身上升起。你获得对火焰伤害的免疫，持续10分钟。

item.name: Bagpipes of Droning
entries: 你必须精通吹奏乐器才能使用这些{@item bagpipes|PHB}。它们有3个充能。你可以使用一个动作吹奏它们，消耗1个充能，制造出一种沉闷、嗡嗡作响的声音，让生物陷入魔法沉睡。投掷{@dice 10d8}；总数表示这个法术可以影响多少生物的生命值。距离你20英尺内的生物按照当前生命值升序受到影响（忽略{@condition unconscious}生物）。
从当前生命值最低的生物开始，每个受影响的生物会在1分钟内陷入沉睡状态，或者直到该沉睡者受到伤害。在继续处理生命值次低的生物之前，从总数中减去每个生物的生命值。生物的生命值必须等于或小于剩余总数才能受到影响。
对不死生物和免疫于被 {@condition charmed} 的生物无效。 {@item bagpipes|PHB} 在每天黎明时恢复 {@dice 1d3} 已使用的充能。
有人曾经说过，听过一首风笛曲，就听过全部了。这是过于愤世嫉俗的评价，但我承认这种音乐是一种习 acquired taste。(bagpipe)。

item.name: Balance of Judgement
entries: 这是一套小黄铜天平。当一根头发、一小片指甲或类似物放在其中一个托盘上时，如果物主的属性是善良的，托盘会上升；如果是邪恶属性，托盘会下沉。对于中立属性，托盘保持静止。

item.name: Balance of Power
entries: 当价值至少500 gp 的宝石被放置在这个整洁的黄铜天平的右手托盘上时，宝石会被摧毁，并且你选择的一个能力值会被改变为20，直到次日黎明。如果你的能力值已经是20或更高，则没有效果。一旦使用，直到次日黎明之前，这个天平的属性就不能再次使用。

item.name: Ball of Power
entries: 这个水晶球直径3英寸，散发着柔和的紫光。当你握着它的时候，你可以用一个动作说出口令来激活它。它会持续激活1分钟。在此期间，你对所有伤害具有抗性，你的力量属性值变为25。如果你的力量属性值已经是25或更高，该物品对你的力量属性值没有影响。
使用后，直到下一个黎明之前，这个球就不能再次使用。

item.name: Banner of the Storm's Eye
entries: 这面军旗展开时长达8英尺。它有深蓝色的背景，中间有白色涡旋图案，描绘了飓风的俯视图。
在展开并高举横幅后的1小时内，横幅周围20英尺范围内的所有生物对于被 {@condition frightened} 和 {@condition stunned} 免疫。一旦使用，横幅的这种属性直到次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

item.name: Bead of Accuracy
entries: 这颗橙色玻璃珠直径为三四分之一英寸。你可以使用一个动作，让它向你60英尺内的生物飞去。目标必须进行一次{@dc 15}敏捷豁免才能，未通过则珠子会击中并附着在目标身上。只要珠子附着在目标身上，它会发出柔和的光芒，任何对目标的远程武器攻击都具有优势。珠子在1分钟后会掉落，但除非使用{@spell wish}法术，否则无法移除。
一旦使用了这颗（bead）（Bead of Force），直到第二天黎明之前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Bead of Dew
entries: 这颗绿色的珠子是由白垩制成的，直径一英寸。当它被放入水中时，立即溶解并净化高达1,000加仑的液体，使其摆脱毒素和疾病。它还可以将盐水变成淡水。

item.name: Beady Eye
entries: 这个物品直径约半英寸，由多彩玻璃制成。您可以使用一个动作来说出它的口令并激活它。它会保持激活状态，直到1小时过去或您再次使用一个动作说出口令。
当激活时，你可以透过这颗珠子看到，就像它是你的一只眼睛一样，只要这颗珠子离你不超过60英尺。如果这颗珠子被滚动，你必须进行一次成功的{@dc 15}体质豁免才能避免在{@dice 1d6}回合内因头晕而变成{@condition stunned}。
如果这颗珠子被摧毁，你必须进行成功的{@dc 15}体质豁免才能避免成为{@condition blinded}，直到你完成一次长休。如果你透过这颗珠子看向具有凝视攻击的怪物，你会受到与直接看向怪物一样的影响。
一旦使用了这颗（bead）（Bead of Force），直到第二天黎明之前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Bell of Freedom
entries: 这只小小的金色铃铛没有铃舌。当被金属钥匙敲击时，它会发出清脆响亮的声音，15英尺范围内所有普通的锁立即打开。对于魔法锁无效。
这个铃铛可以使用十次。第十次之后，它会裂开并变得无用。
对于那些没有盗贼的冒险者来说，这是一种特别有用的装置。而在队伍中包括一个自称为盗贼的人，对我来说总是有些违反逻辑。

item.name: Bellows of Breath
entries: 这些风箱由黑色橡胶和深色木材制成，带有钢制喷嘴。您可以使用一个动作来泵动风箱，导致它们在一个20英尺锥形范围内呼出一团绿雾。该区域内的每个生物必须进行一次{@dc 15}体质豁免才能，未通过则受到{@damage 3d6}毒素伤害，通过则受到一半伤害。即使生物屏住呼吸或者不需要呼吸，它们也会受到影响。
一旦使用，这个风箱的特性直到下一个黎明才能再次使用。

item.name: Bellows of Strong Wind
entries: 这些风箱由棕色皮革和硬木制成，带有黄铜喷嘴。您可以使用一个动作来泵风箱，使其呼出一条60英尺长、10英尺宽的强风线，持续1分钟。每个在该线上开始回合的生物必须成功通过一个{@dc 15}力量豁免才能避免被推离风箱15英尺，方向沿着该线。
任何在这条线上的生物，当向着风箱移动时，每移动1英尺需要花费2英尺的移动力。
风会将气体或蒸汽扩散开来，并熄灭区域内的蜡烛、火炬和类似的无保护火焰。它会让灯笼等受保护的火焰疯狂舞动，并有{@chance 50}的几率将它们熄灭。
在效果结束前的每个回合，你可以将风箱指向的方向作为一个奖励动作改变。
一旦使用，这个风箱的特性直到下一个黎明才能再次使用。

item.name: Belt of Naked Invisibility
entries: 佩戴这条腰带时，你可以将自己变为{@condition invisible}，作为一个动作。腰带也会将{@condition invisible}，但你穿戴的其他物品不会变成{@condition invisible}。你会保持{@condition invisible}，直到腰带被移除，直到你{@action attack}或{@action cast a spell}，或者直到你使用一个奖励动作再次变得可见。
有人认为这个物品是作为一个笑话而创造的。如果是这样的话，那就是一个昂贵的笑话。更有可能的是，我认为，显而易见的缺陷是由于创造者的疏忽造成的。这种情况在学者中经常发生，尽管他们不愿承认。

item.name: Belt of Pankration
entries: 这条深色皮带上镶嵌着花纹黄铜板。佩戴时，你可以使用一个奖励动作对你{@action grapple|PHB|grappling}的任何生物进行一次徒手攻击，前提是你有一只空手。

item.name: Belt of the Wide Earth
entries: 这条厚实的皮带布满裂缝和裂缝，由一块黑曜石制成的沉重扣环固定。佩戴这条皮带时，{@quickref difficult terrain|PHB|3}不会让你额外消耗移动力，并且在确定你的携带能力以及推、拉或举起的重量时，你被视为比实际体积大一号。
另外，你可以使用一个动作并施放{@spell teleport}法术。一旦使用，直到第二天黎明之前，这个腰带的这个特性就无法再次使用。

item.name: Blanket of Healing
entries: 这条羊毛毯子是4英尺见方，上面有红白相间的条纹图案。如果你在短暂休息时用这条毯子盖住自己，你将为任何消耗的骰子投掷的最大数量的命中点数回复。

item.name: Bone of Animation
entries: 这个物品看起来是一根普通的人类上臂骨。当你握住这根骨头时，你可以使用一个动作来说出咒语，将这根骨头变成一个{@creature skeleton}。这个{@creature skeleton}会在1小时后或者生命值降为0时恢复成骨头形态。
在持续时间内，{@creature skeleton} 对你和你的同伴友好。为{@creature skeleton} 掷骰子决定先攻顺序，它有自己的回合。它会遵从你发出的口头命令（你无需采取任何行动）。如果你没有给{@creature skeleton} 下达任何命令，它会保护自己免受敌对生物的伤害，但不会采取其他行动。
一旦使用了这根骨头，直到第二天黎明之前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Bone of Bruising
entries: 这个物品看起来是一根普通的人类胫骨。你可以使用一个奖励动作将这根骨头扔到空中并说出口令。当你这样做时，骨头开始悬浮，飞行到30英尺高，并攻击你选择的一个在它5英尺范围内的生物。当你进行攻击时，攻击加值为{@hit 5}。这根骨头造成{@damage 1d4 + 3} 钝击伤害。
当骨骼悬浮时，你可以使用一个奖励动作，使其飞行到距离你不超过30英尺的另一个位置。作为同一个奖励动作的一部分，你可以让骨骼攻击距离它不超过5英尺的一个生物。
在悬浮骨骼第四次攻击后，它会掉落在地面上。一旦使用，这个骨骼的特性直到下一个黎明之前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Boots of Carrying
entries: 当你穿着这双棕色皮靴时，你在确定携带能力和推、拉或举起重量时被视为体积更大一号。

item.name: Bottle of Containment
entries: 这个6英寸高的方形玻璃瓶有一个漏斗形状的颈部和一个橡胶塞。它可以容纳多达20单位的任何液体，每个单位可以是魔法药水或多达1加仑的普通液体。在瓶子里，每种液体都是分开存放的。可以通过说出液体的名字并将瓶子倒置来从瓶子中取出液体。如果瓶子被打碎，所有存放的液体都会被排出。

item.name: Bottle of Fireflies
entries: 这个矮胖瓶子由透明玻璃制成，带有软木塞。当将一袋葡萄酒倒入瓶中时，葡萄酒被消耗，瓶子则充满了无数微小的光点。瓶子在30英尺半径范围内发出{@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|bright light} 的光，再额外延伸30英尺发出{@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|dim light} 的光。你可以使用一个动作命令瓶子扩大或缩小其{@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|bright and dim light} 的半径，每次5英尺，最多可达60英尺，最少为5英尺。光持续1天，之后可以用另一袋葡萄酒重新点燃。
这是我见过的大多数用酒的更好方式。

item.name: Bottle of Moonlight
entries: 这个新月形状的瓶子由淡色石头制成，里面装着一种浓稠的银色液体。当你使用一个动作将这种液体倒在一个狼人身上时，那个生物立即进入其野兽形态，持续1小时。

item.name: Bracelet of Animal Speech
entries: 当你将这件物品戴在手腕上时，你将获得与一种野兽沟通的能力。副作用是你将无法再说其他语言，只能发出你上次与野兽交流时发出的声音，比如吠叫或喵喵叫。这个效果持续到你摘下手腕上的手镯。
许多野兽的知识和意识受到它们的智力限制，但至少，野兽可以为你提供关于附近位置和怪物的信息，包括它们能感知到或在过去一天内感知到的任何事物。在DM的裁量下，你可能能说服一只野兽为你做一点小事情。

item.name: Bracers of Lightning
entries: 这些护腕由铜丝固定的矩形石英晶体制成。佩戴时，每当你用近战攻击命中生物时，你会对目标造成额外 {@damage 1d8} 的闪电伤害。

item.name: Bracers of Wind
entries: 这些护腕由银板通过装饰性皮带固定在一起制成。佩戴这些护腕时，您可以使用一个动作来说出它们的口令并激活它们。它们会保持激活状态，直到您再次使用一个动作来说出它们的口令。
当护腕激活时，一股强风在你的身体周围鼓荡涌动，使你对远程攻击获得+2的AC奖励。

item.name: Bridle of Control
entries: 这个笼头是由黑色皮革制成，带有钢制马嚼子。当戴在坐骑头上时，该生物会变得平静，无法被 {@condition frightened}，只要它戴着这个笼头。

item.name: Bridle of Speaking
entries: 这个马勒是用黄色皮革制成的，上面印有随机字母。当戴在坐骑头上时，该生物的智力变为10，并获得说话的能力 {@language common}。如果取下马勒，坐骑将恢复正常。

item.name: Bridle of Wings
entries: 这个马勒是用红色皮革制成的，上面印有羽毛图案，并配有铜制马嚼。当马嚼安装在坐骑上时，你可以用一个动作来说出它的口令。这会导致一对鸟翼从坐骑的背部长出，持续1小时，或者直到你再次用一个动作重复口令。这对翅膀让坐骑获得60英尺的飞行速度。一旦使用，这个马勒的特性在次日黎明前不能再次使用。

item.name: Brooch of Bones
entries: 这个奇怪的胸针由5根小骨头排列成五角星形状。佩戴这个胸针时，你可以使用一个动作来说出它的口令，获得特殊保护，使得不死生物对你的攻击有劣势。在1分钟内，不死生物对你的攻击投掷有劣势，并且它们不能 {@condition charmed|PHB|charm}，{@condition frightened|PHB|frighten}，或者控制你。一旦使用，这个胸针的特性直到次日黎明前都无法再次使用。
一件相当阴森的物品，尤其是在社交场合中穿着。但当有死灵法师出现时，它绝对是非常有用的。

item.name: Broom of Serving
entries: 这个物品看起来像是一把普通的扫帚，有一个4英尺长的木柄和用稻草制成的刷子。当你说出扫帚的口令后，它会长出六只细长的木臂，刷子分裂成两条稻草腿。
这把扫帚的行走速度为30英尺，可以在手臂上携带高达500磅的重量。它会跟随你并努力保持在你的10英尺范围内。只要你们在同一平面上，它就能毫无差错地找到你。当你再次说出它的口令时，扫帚会恢复原来的形态。

item.name: Buckle of Armor
entries: 这个银镀带扣被雕刻成一个小圆盾的样子，盾牌中央有一个月长石作为盾牌的中心。当佩戴时，只要你没有穿其他盔甲，你的基础护甲等级为17。你不能加上你的敏捷奖励到你的护甲等级，但你可以通过其他物品，比如盾牌或魔法戒指来增强你的护甲等级。

item.name: Buckle of Protection
entries: 这个镀金的扣环是长方形的，上面刻有窄箭头纹。佩戴这件物品时，你的AC和豁免投掷获得+1的加值。

item.name: Buckle of Weaponry
entries: 这个铁制扣子的形状像一个小型武器架，上面固定着几把微型武器—一个{@item mace|PHB}、一个{@item spear|PHB}、一个{@item warhammer|PHB}、一个{@item battleaxe|PHB}和一个{@item greatsword|PHB}。你可以用一个奖励动作从扣子上取下其中一把武器，使其变大到正常尺寸。一旦变大，它们将作为普通武器使用。
你可以使用另一个奖励动作，触摸武器到(Weapon of Returning)的扣环上，使其缩小并重新连接。

item.name: Bugle of Reviving
entries: 这个乐器大约一英尺长，由实心黄铜制成。只要你精通吹奏乐器，你可以使用一个动作吹奏军号，演奏出响亮激昂的曲调。当你这样做时，你周围30英尺内最多七具小型或中型尸体会被{@creature zombie|MM|zombies}复活。
在你的每个回合中，你可以使用一个额外动作来精神指挥由{@creature zombie|MM}用号角召唤的生物，只要该生物距离你不超过60英尺（如果你控制多个生物，你可以同时指挥任意数量的生物，给每个生物下达相同的指令）。如果你没有下达指令，生物只会保护自己免受敌对生物的攻击。该生物会在你的控制下保持24小时，之后它会变回尸体。
一旦你使用了这个(`bugle`)的特性，它直到第二天黎明之前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Button of Blasting
entries: 这个小骨质按钮可以被准确地投掷到你选择的地点，距离你150英尺内。当它到达目标时，它会爆炸成一团火焰。以那一点为中心的20英尺半径范围内的每个生物必须进行一次{@dc 15} 敏捷豁免。在未通过豁免时，目标会受到{@damage 10d6} 火焰伤害，通过豁免则只受到一半伤害。按钮在爆炸中被消耗。

item.name: Button of Rosy Vision
entries: 这些按钮总是成对出现，一个是玫瑰色宝石制成的，另一个是黄铜制成的。当将玫瑰色按钮缝在衣物上时，如果将黄铜按钮举到眼前，你可以透过玫瑰色按钮看到背后的景象，就好像你就在那里一样。这两个按钮必须在同一平面上才能产生这种效果。

item.name: Cage of Entrapment
entries: 这个正方形的红木笼子每边长6英寸，顶部附有精美的黄铜把手。你可以使用一个动作用笼子触摸一个{@filter beast of size large or smaller|bestiary|source=|type=beast|miscellaneous=|size=t;s;m;l}。生物必须进行成功的{@dc 15} 体质豁免才能被缩小进入笼子。如果笼子里已经有一个生物，你用笼子触摸另一个生物时，什么也不会发生。
一旦进入笼子，野兽需要食物、水和空气，与正常情况一样。打开笼门会导致野兽在最近的未被占据的空间恢复正常大小。
我不止一次使用这个装置将野兽赶离定居点。但有时候平衡要求杀死这只野兽，有时候要求让它自由地肆虐定居点。

item.name: Cameo of Appearance
entries: 这块小巧的椭圆形象牙片有一个优雅的银框，上面刻有一个穿着全脸头盔的肌肉壮硕战士的侧面轮廓。当你佩戴它时，你可以使用一个动作来说出它的口令，一个{@creature gladiator|MM}会出现在最近的未被占据的空间中。
在持续时间内，{@creature gladiator|MM} 无法说话，但对你和你的同伴友好。为{@creature gladiator|MM} 掷骰子决定先攻顺序，它有自己的回合。它会遵从你发出的口头命令（你无需采取任何行动）。如果你没有发布任何命令，它会保护自己免受敌对生物的伤害，但不会采取其他行动。
{@creature gladiator|MM}在你召唤它后的一小时后消失。一旦这个宝石被使用，直到第二天黎明之前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Candle of Protection
entries: 这件物品看起来是一个铜制烛台中的普通蜡烛。当点燃蜡烛时，蜡烛的魔法就会被激活，这需要一个动作。燃烧1小时后，蜡烛就会被摧毁，或者你可以提前熄灭它以便以后再次使用。从蜡烛的总燃烧时间中逐分钟减去它燃烧的时间。
当点燃时，在半径为10英尺的范围内照亮{@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|bright light}，并额外延伸10英尺照亮{@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|dim light}。任何在这光线中开始回合的不死生物会受到{@damage 1d6}辐射伤害。

item.name: Cane of Armament
entries: 这件物品看起来像是一根普通的行走手杖。当你握住它时，你可以使用一个奖励动作将其转变成一把{@item +1 rapier|DMG}，或者将其转变回行走手杖。

item.name: Cane of Detection
entries: 如果你用这根拐杖敲击墙壁、地板或门，它会让半径20英尺范围内的任何陷阱在微弱发光，持续1分钟。这根拐杖有6个充能。每次使用消耗1个充能。这根拐杖每天黎明时恢复{@dice 1d6}消耗的充能。

item.name: Cape of Disguise
entries: 穿着这件羽毛装饰的深红披风时，你可以使用一个动作随意施放{@spell disguise self}法术。如果移除披风，法术将结束。

item.name: Cape of Reeking
entries: 穿着这件破绿披风时，你可以使用一个动作施放{@spell stinking cloud}法术。一旦使用，披风的这个属性直到第二天黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Cat's Eye Marble
entries: 这个小玻璃球形似绿色猫眼。握在手中，使你{@sense darkvision}范围扩展至60英尺。

item.name: Chalice of Colors
entries: 一旦这个透明玻璃圣杯被注满水，你可以使用你的动作将内容朝任何方向投掷。液体会变成一团刺眼的闪烁彩色光芒。掷骰{@dice 6d10}；总数表示受影响生物的生命值。从你起始的一个15英尺锥形区域内的生物按照当前生命值升序受到影响（忽略看不见的生物）。
从当前生命值最低的生物开始，锥形范围内的每个生物都受到{@condition blinded}，直到你的下一个回合结束。在转移到生命值次低的生物之前，从总数中减去每个生物的生命值。生物的生命值必须等于或小于剩余总数，才能受到影响。
一旦使用，这个圣杯的属性在下一个黎明之前不能再次使用。

item.name: Chalice of Detection
entries: 这只圣杯由美丽的水晶制成，底座是圆形的，柄呈球形，而杯身则呈高脚杯风格。如果将其装满水并靠近毒药不超过5英尺，水会变成一种病态的绿色。毒性怪物、气体、武器和陷阱都会触发这种效果。即使将圣杯移开超过5英尺，水仍然保持绿色。
一旦使用，这个圣杯的属性直到下一个黎明之前都不能再次使用。在重新使用之前，圣杯还必须被倒空并重新装满水。

item.name: Chalice of Identification
entries: 这个铜杯镀银，刻有盘旋的波浪图案。当药剂倒入其中时，药剂的名字会以雾白色的字母出现在液体表面上。这个杯子可以无限次使用，但每次使用之间必须用水彻底清洗，否则字母不会出现。

item.name: Claw of Magical Theft
entries: 这只小爪子长3英寸，由纯银制成。握住它时，你可以使用一个动作说出它的口令，让一个幽灵般的爪子出现在你30英尺内的一个咒术师的空间中。
对该生物进行远程法术攻击。命中后，目标失去其最高级别的法术位，最高可达5级。与此同时，你会恢复一个已用掉的法术位，其等级与你偷取的法术位相同或更低。
一旦攻击发动，幽灵之手就会消失。
被这个物品攻击过后，我可以向你保证这是一种非常不舒服的经历。

item.name: Cloak of the Phoenix
entries: 这件及地长披风由金色凤凰羽毛制成，并用精美铂金链环绕颈部。穿着这件披风时，你的飞行速度等同于你的行走速度。

item.name: Crown of Leadership
entries: 这顶王冠由一条镶有十颗无瑕钻石的金带组成。佩戴这顶王冠时，你的魅力值将变为18。如果你的魅力值已经等于或大于18，则该物品对你的魅力没有影响。
此外，你可以使用你的动作来说出皇冠的口令。在1分钟内，你周围10英尺范围内的所有友方生物对于被 {@condition frightened} 或 {@condition charmed} 免疫，并在他们的每个回合开始时获得临时生命值，数值等同于你的魅力加值的两倍。一旦使用，皇冠的这个特性直到次日黎明前都无法再次使用。
有些人天生领袖，而其他人则需要一点点魔法的帮助。

item.name: Crystal of Alacrity
entries: 这颗圆形黄玉上雕刻着一位全副武装的骑士。当它附着在中型或重型盔甲上时，该盔甲不再需要力量要求。

item.name: Crystal of Aquatic Action
entries: 当你拿着这块小小的海蓝水晶时，你可以在水下呼吸，并获得与你步行速度相同的游泳速度。此外，在水下进行攻击不会对你造成任何惩罚。

item.name: Cube of Abilities
entries: 这个小木骰子的六个面上分别绘有红色的纹章符号。这些符号及其含义为：
当你投掷骰子时，指定的能力值增加2点，相应的最大值也增加2点。骰子在使用后立即消失。

item.name: Cube of Luck
entries: 这个小骨骰子看起来像是一个普通的骰子。你可以用一个动作来说出它的口令，然后它在接下来的1分钟内只会掷出六点。

item.name: Curtain of Spying
entries: 这看起来是一条普通的锦缎帘子，一侧高9英尺，宽6英尺。从另一侧看，它完全透明，是一种极好的单向观察工具。如果将帘子放在地上，透明面朝上，需要成功进行一次{@dc 15}感知({@skill Perception})检定才能发现它。

item.name: Cymbals of Crashing
entries: 这些银色手持铙钹宽8英寸，上面附有棕色皮革绑带。当它们被敲击在一起时，会发出巨大的撞击声，60英尺内的每只飞行生物都必须进行一次{@dc 15}体质豁免才能。未通过豁免的生物在你的下一个回合开始前，飞行速度降为0英尺。

item.name: Deck of Chance
entries: 这个盒子里装有十块薄薄的象牙瓷砖，每一块都精美地绘有不同的图案。当你从牌组中随机抽取一块瓷砖时，这块瓷砖会永久消失，而你会经历所指示的效果。

rows: 你的武器攻击在命中时额外造成{@damage 1d8}点辐射伤害。
你被转变成了一个{@creature wraith|MM}。你的立场和个性保持不变。
你的阵营变为混乱邪恶。
你所拥有的所有金钱、宝石和珠宝都消失了。这包括你在共同财宝中所持有的那部分财富。
每句话都要押韵对，否则说话就要受伤害 {@damage 2d8}。
任何你与之交谈至少1分钟的陌生人必须成功通过一个{@dc 15}的感知豁免检定，否则会被你{@condition charmed}1小时。
你被转变成了一个{@creature evoker|VGM}。你的立场和个性保持不变。
你手中出现了{@item holy avenger|DMG}。如果你把剑给其他人，它会消失。
你的阵营的一位神灵在幻觉中出现。你可以提出最多三个问题，每个问题都可以用是或否回答，并且每个问题都会得到正确的答案。
你在所有智力、感知和魅力属性检定上获得优势。(Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma)

entries: 效果持续到第二天黎明。每天只能抽取一块瓦片—抽取后续瓦片没有效果。

item.name: Divan of Divination
entries: 这是一张没有靠背或扶手的低沙发。通常装饰豪华，可以是任何颜色或尺寸。如果你在这张长沙发上休息，你会在梦中遇到一个天使般的存在。你可以问一个关于特定目标、事件或活动的问题，在7天内得到一个真实的回答。回答可能是一个简短的短语、一个神秘的韵文，或者一个预兆。
回复没有考虑到可能改变结果的任何情况，比如施放法术或失去或获得同伴的情况，(%num%)。
一旦使用了沙发，必须等待7天后才能再次使用。(divan)

item.name: Drum of Silence
entries: 当你握住这个小{@item hand drum|SCAG}时，你可以使用一个动作来打击它，并施放{@spell silence}法术，其影响范围以你为中心。一旦使用，这个{@item hand drum|SCAG|drum}的特性直到次日黎明前都无法再次使用。
莱昂曼告诉我他用这个装置来中和那些讨厌的施法者和令人厌烦的晚宴客人。莱昂曼可能是一个相当轻浮的家伙。

item.name: Drums of Panic
entries: 当你使用一个动作来玩这些小{@item hand drum|SCAG|hand drums}时，每一个在你30英尺范围内并听到你声音的敌对生物必须成功通过一个{@dc 15}感知豁免才能免疫你，否则会成为你的{@condition frightened}1分钟。
一个未通过豁免检定的生物可以在自己的每个回合结束时重复检定，成功则结束自身上的效果。一个成功通过豁免检定的生物对这些鼓的效果免疫24小时。一旦使用，这些鼓的这个特性直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Dust of Sleeping
entries: 通常被发现在一个小皮袋里，这种粉末看起来像细腻的白色沙子。里面有足够的粉末供一次使用。当你使用一个动作将一把粉末撒向空中时，你周围10英尺内需要呼吸的每个生物必须成功进行一次{@dc 15}体质豁免才能不陷入{@condition unconscious}状态，持续1分钟，直到沉睡者受到伤害，或者有人使用一个动作摇醒或拍打沉睡者。你对这种效果免疫。

item.name: Egg of Fog
entries: 这个物品看起来像一个普通的鸡蛋。当它被打碎时，会从中散发出一个直径40英尺的雾气球体。这个球体会绕过拐角，覆盖范围为{@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|heavily obscured}。雾气会持续1小时，或者直到中等或更大风速（至少10英里每小时）吹散它。

item.name: Eyepatch of Sight
entries: 这件物品由一小块黑色皮革固定在细头带上组成。当戴在眼睛上时，它可以让你{@sense truesight}，范围为60英尺。效果持续1小时，或者直到你取下眼罩。使用后，眼罩的这个特性直到次日黎明前都无法再次使用。

item.name: Fan of Dancing
entries: 当握着这把扇子时，你可以使用一个动作将其挥向距离你10英尺内的一个生物。目标将在原地进行一场滑稽的舞蹈，持续1分钟。无法被 {@condition charmed} 的生物对此效果免疫。
一个跳舞生物的速度为0英尺，对敏捷豁免和攻击骰有劣势。当目标受到影响时，其他生物对其的攻击骰有优势。作为一个动作，跳舞生物进行一次感知豁免骰来恢复自控。成功豁免后，效果结束。
风扇的这个特性一旦使用过，直到下一个黎明之前都无法再次使用。

item.name: Flute of Courage
entries: 你必须精通吹奏乐器才能使用这个{@item flute|PHB}。如果你以一个动作吹奏{@item flute|PHB}，则在一个半径为20英尺的球体内的每个人形生物在接听你的声音时，免疫被{@condition frightened}的影响，持续1分钟。一旦使用，这个{@item flute|PHB}的特性直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Flute of Faerie
entries: 你必须精通吹奏乐器才能使用这个{@item flute|PHB}。如果你将{@item flute|PHB}作为一个动作演奏，你会召唤出仙族生物，它们会出现在你能看到的范围内的空地上。
根据以下表格进行投掷以确定出现的内容：

footnotes: * These creatures are from {@book Volo's Guide to Monsters|VGM}.

entries: 当一个被召唤的生物的生命值降至0或者经过一个小时后会消失。被召唤的生物对你和你的同伴友好。它们会服从你发出的任何口头命令（你不需要采取任何行动）。
一旦使用，{@item flute|PHB} 的这个特性直到次日黎明之前都无法再次使用。

item.name: Frostfallian Diamond Dust
entries: 这种魔法尘土看起来像非常细腻的透明沙子。当它被扔进壁炉时，在同一存在平面上的任何距离上，它会在它和另一个壁炉之间创造一个魔法链接。你必须至少曾经触摸过目的地壁炉。在1个月内，任何生物都可以通过使用5英尺的移动，从目标壁炉走进，然后从目的地壁炉出来，反之亦然。
这种材料来自冰霜之地，由霜主的艾拉德林仆人制造。那是一个狡诈的生物，如果你遇到他，应该小心。

item.name: Gauntlets of Dexterity
entries: 当你戴着这双柔软的长及肘部的皮手套时，你的敏捷属性得分为18。如果你的敏捷属性在没有戴手套时已经是18或更高，那么这手套对你没有任何影响。

item.name: Gauntlets of the Storm
entries: 这些金属手套，也被称为风暴臂铠，闪电在其上电闪雷鸣，空气中弥漫着臭氧的气味。佩戴它们时，你对闪电伤害具有抗性。
这双臂铠有4个充能。你可以使用一个动作消耗1个或更多充能来施放以下法术之一（豁免{@dc 15}）：（{@spell shocking grasp}）（1个充能），（{@spell lightning bolt}）（3个充能），或（{@spell storm sphere|XGE}）（4个充能）。
护手在每天黎明时恢复{@dice 1d4}已用尽的充能。

item.name: Gavel of Authority
entries: 当这个槌击打在一块木头上时，你在接下来的1小时内在所有你的魅力检定中获得优势({@skill Persuasion})或魅力({@skill Intimidation})。一旦使用，这个槌的属性直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Globe of Sunlight
entries: 这个物品类似于一个多面黄色钻石，直径约2英寸。你可以使用一个动作将这个球体投掷出去，最远可达60英尺。当它到达轨迹的尽头时，球体会爆炸，释放出一个半径40英尺的明亮阳光球体。球体在爆炸时被消耗。
在那道光线中的每个生物必须进行一次 {@dc 15} 体质豁免投掷。未通过豁免的生物会受到 {@damage 12d6} 辐射伤害，并在1分钟内被 {@condition blinded}。通过豁免的生物会受到一半伤害，并且不会被这个法术 {@condition blinded}。不死生物和软泥怪在这次豁免投掷中有劣势。
一个生物在此效果下每个回合结束时都要进行另一次体质豁免投掷。在成功豁免后，它就不再是{@condition blinded}。

item.name: Gloves of the Grappler
entries: 这些无指手套由黑色硬皮制成。佩戴时，当你尝试{@action grapple|PHB}一个生物时，你在你的{@action grapple|PHB}检定上获得优势。此外，当你移动一个{@condition grappled}生物时，你的速度不会减半。

item.name: Gloves of the Starry Sky
entries: 这些柔软的手套是由黑色天鹅绒制成的，上面缝有小钻石。戴上它们后，你可以随意施放{@spell light}法术。
手套有3个充能。你可以使用一个动作并消耗1个充能来施放{@spell magic missile}作为一个5级法术。所创建的飞弹看起来像一场流星雨。手套每天黎明时恢复3个充能。

item.name: Goggles of the Golden Sun
entries: 这副护目镜由包裹着黑色皮革的钢制成，镜片是反光的金色。佩戴时，你免疫于{@condition blinded}状态。
这副护目镜有3次使用机会。你可以使用一个动作并消耗1次使用机会来施放{@spell flame strike}法术。这副手套每天黎明时恢复3次使用机会。

item.name: Golden Tongue
entries: 这个护身符看起来像一只小小的金色舌头。戴在脖子上时，它让你在魅力检定时获得优势（{@skill Persuasion}）—然而，你必须用押韵的对句来陈述你的论点。如果你在检定时未能押韵，你会受到{@damage 1d8}点心灵伤害。
我不能自称为诗人。也许其他人会觉得这个物品更有用。(poet)

item.name: Gong of Celestial Summoning
entries: 这个金色的手锣宽6英寸，手柄由银线制成。当敲击时，你召唤一个{@filter celestial of challenge rating 5 or lower|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&5]|type=celestial|miscellaneous=}，它出现在你能看到的范围内的一个空地方。当它的生命值降至0点或1小时时间到达时，天界生物会消失。
在此期间，天界生物对你和你的同伴友好。为天界生物投掷先攻骰，它有自己的回合。只要不违背其立场，它会遵从你口头下达的任何命令（你不需要采取任何行动）。如果你没有下达任何命令给天界生物，它会保护自己免受敌对生物的伤害，但不会采取其他行动。
一旦使用了锣，直到第二天黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Gong of Earthquakes
entries: 这个铜制手锣宽12英寸，有一个红色绳子把手。当敲击时，一股强烈的震颤会在以锣为中心的60英尺半径圆圈内的地面上蔓延，并震动该区域接触地面的所有物体。震颤持续1分钟。
该区域的地面变成{@quickref difficult terrain|PHB|3}。每个在地面上的生物，如果是{@status Concentration|PHB|concentrating}，必须进行一次体质豁免才能。未能通过豁免的生物，其{@status concentration}会被打断。
当锣响起并在每个回合结束时，只要震颤持续，区域内地面上的每个生物都必须进行一次敏捷豁免检定。未通过检定的生物被击倒{@condition prone}。永久结构不会受到损坏，但松动的物品如家具可能会倒下。
一旦使用，这个锣的属性在下一个黎明之前不能再次使用。

item.name: Gong of Whirlwinds
entries: 这个银锣宽18英寸，边缘上有两个打孔，可以用来悬挂。当敲击这个锣时，会在周围出现一个持续1分钟的旋风。所有距离锣10英尺内的生物必须进行一次{@dc 15}力量豁免。未通过豁免的目标会受到{@damage 3d8 + 2} 钝击伤害，并被从锣处随机方向抛出20英尺，并晕眩{@condition prone}。
一旦使用，这个锣的属性在下一个黎明之前不能再次使用。

item.name: Greenstone Amulet
entries: 这块绿色宝石巴掌大小，雕刻成盾牌的形状。佩戴此物时，你对精神伤害免疫，任何能感知你情绪或读取你思维的效果，占卜法术，以及{@condition charmed}，{@condition frightened}和{@condition stunned}状态。该物品甚至能破坏{@spell wish}法术，以及用于影响你思维或获取你信息的法术或类似力量的效果。
我的独特哲学意味着我结交了许多敌人，却结交了很少的盟友。我要向你们这些值得信赖的同事坦白，我已经拥有这些物品中的一个很多年了，它一直是无价之宝。

item.name: Hammersphere
entries: 这个直径3英寸的银色球体上刻有数十个小锤子形状的符号。当你握住这个球体时，你可以在奖励动作中说出它的口令，从而在你身边60英尺内出现一个飘浮的幽灵锤子。
当你召唤锤子时，你可以对武器附近5英尺内的生物进行一次近战法术攻击。进行攻击时，你使用攻击加值为{@hit 5}。命中时，目标受到{@damage 3d8 + 5}点力量伤害。
作为你的奖励动作，在你的回合中，你可以将锤子移动最多20英尺，并对它附近5英尺范围内的生物重复攻击。
锤子在1分钟后消失，直到第二天黎明才能再次召唤。

item.name: Handkerchief of Length
entries: 这件物品看起来像是一条普通的丝绸手帕。然而，当你把它放进口袋里并说出口令时，你就可以从口袋里拉出一条长达50英尺的彩色手帕链。这与一块普通的{@item Silk Rope (50 feet)|PHB|rope} 完全一样。
当你把手帕塞回口袋时，它们会恢复成原来的手帕。

item.name: Harp of Questing
entries: 使用这个小型膝上竖琴，你必须精通弦乐器。当你使用一个动作演奏这件物品时，你可以对能听懂你的生物施加一个魔法命令，强迫它执行你决定的某项任务。
生物必须成功进行一次{@dc 15}的感知豁免检定，否则会被你支配，持续30天。当生物被你支配时，每次它行动违背你的指令时，会受到{@damage 5d10}的心灵伤害，但每天最多只能受到一次。
你可以下达任何你选择的命令，只要不是会导致死亡的活动。要提前结束效果的唯一方法是使用 {@spell remove curse}，{@spell greater restoration} 或 {@spell wish} 法术。
弹奏(哈普)(harp)后，必须等待7天才能再次使用。
曾经有一段时间，我会摧毁任何我用不上的魔法物品，相信这是保持平衡的最佳方式。这是一个不成熟的信念。在那段时间里，我摧毁了其中一个(`harps`)，现在我后悔了，因为它们是非凡的装置。

item.name: Harp of Silence
entries: 要使用这把小竖琴，你必须精通弦乐器。当你使用一个动作来演奏这件物品时，你施放{@spell silence}法术，效果范围以自己为中心。一旦使用，竖琴的这个特性在次日黎明前无法再次使用。

item.name: Harp of Thunder
entries: 你必须精通弦乐器才能使用这把小型膝上竖琴。当你使用一个动作演奏这件物品时，它会在一个20英尺锥形范围内发出一声雷鸣般的爆炸。锥形范围内的每个生物必须成功通过一个{@dc 15} 体质豁免才能在你的下一个回合结束前保持{@condition stunned}。一旦使用，竖琴的这个属性直到次日黎明前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Hasp of Locking
entries: 当你将这个黄铜扣环放在一扇关闭的门、窗户、大门、箱子或其他入口上时，它会在一段时间内变成锁定状态。只有你可以移除这个扣环，尽管在锁定的物体上施放{@spell knock}可以抑制扣环的魔法效果10分钟。否则，锁定的物体除非破坏，否则无法打开。

item.name: Heart of Hearing
entries: 当你握着这颗小小的心形红宝石时，你在依赖听觉的感知({@skill Perception})检定中获得优势。

item.name: Heart of Stone
entries: 当你握着这块小小的、心形的花岗岩时，你就无法被{@condition frightened}。

item.name: Horn of Four Winds
entries: 这件物品由黄铜制成，上面刻有螺旋图案。你可以使用一个动作吹响它，施放以下法术之一：{@spell fog cloud} (3级版本)，{@spell gust of wind}，{@spell stinking cloud}，或{@spell wind wall}。
一旦使用，这个（horn）的属性直到第二天黎明之前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Horn of Plenty
entries: 这件物品是用水牛角制成的，带有黄铜吹口。当你吹奏它时，在射程内的地面或容器中创造出45磅食物和30加仑水，足以维持十五个人形生物或五匹坐骑24小时。食物味道平淡但有营养，如果24小时内没有食用就会变质。水是干净的，不会变质。
一旦使用，这个（horn）的属性直到第二天黎明之前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Horn of the Tritons
entries: 这件物品是一个大号的粉色海螺壳。你可以使用一个动作吹响它，产生以下效果之一：

items: 在(1英里)范围内，汹涌的水域会变得平静。
你周围150英尺范围内的所有水生生物必须进行一次成功的{@dc 15}感知豁免才能免疫，否则会在1分钟内成为你的{@condition frightened}。
你召唤一群海洋生物，由主持人选择或随机确定。

entries: 被召唤的生物对你和你的同伴友好。为召唤的生物作为一组投掷先攻骰，它们有自己的回合。它们会遵从你发出的任何口头命令（你不需要采取任何行动）。如果你没有给出任何命令，它们会保护自己免受敌对生物的攻击，但不会采取其他行动。
一旦使用，这个（horn）的属性直到第二天黎明之前都不能再次使用。

item.name: Icy Strand of the North
entries: When found, this thick white cord has {@dice 1d6 + 2} fist-sized shards of ice frozen onto it, which do not melt. While holding this cord, you can use an action to pull off one of the shards and hurl it up to 150 feet to a point you can see. Upon impact it explodes into a hail of rock-hard ice.

Each creature within a 20-foot radius must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 2d8} bludgeoning damage and {@damage 4d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

item.name: Impervious Vestment
entries: This black silk robe is embroidered with a carbuncle pattern using adamantine thread. While wearing these robes you have resistance to all non-magical damage.
Additionally, you can use an action to make yourself immune to all damage for 1 minute or until you take off the robe. Once this special action is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Infinite Scroll Case
entries: This cylindrical silver tube has been engraved with an elaborate pattern in high relief and has a removable cap. You can place as many scrolls as you wish within this scroll case, including magic ones. Whenever you pull a scroll from the case, it is always the one that you desired.

item.name: Inkwell of Scrollmaking
entries: This small, triangular glass bottle is inscribed with esoteric symbols and has a wooden stopper. When a magic scroll is prepared using ink from this inkwell, the preparation time and cost are both halved. The inkwell magically replenishes itself, supplying enough ink to write 100 spell levels worth of scrolls.
This item also reduces the cost of transcribing a spell to your spell book. It is a deceptively powerful tool.

item.name: Iron Heart
entries: This iron charm is the size and shape of a regular heart. When placed on the chest of a humanoid, it is absorbed into the creature's body and replaces its real heart. The recipient immediately gains a +2 bonus to its Constitution ability score.

item.name: Jug of Jade
entries: This 2-foot-tall jug is made of green earthenware and has a cork stopper in its narrow neck. When opened, a cloud of green gas is released filling a 10-foot-radius sphere. The cloud spreads around corners, and its area is {@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|heavily obscured}. The cloud lingers in the air for 1 minute.

Each creature that is completely within the cloud must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it is turned to jade stone and subjected to the {@condition petrified} condition. An affected creature returns to normal after one day has elapsed.
If the stopper is firmly replaced in the jug, it begins slowly filling with gas and is ready again for use 10 days later.

item.name: Jug of Jesting
entries: This 1-foot-tall jug is made of yellowish earthenware and has a cork stopper. When opened, a cloud of translucent yellow gas is released filling a 20-foot-radius sphere. The gas lingers in the air for 1 minute.

Each creature in the cloud must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition prone}, becoming {@condition incapacitated} with laughter and unable to stand up for the duration. A creature with an Intelligence score of 4 or less isn't affected.

At the end of each of its turns, and each time it takes damage, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. The target has advantage on the saving throw if it's triggered by damage. On a success, the effect ends.
Once the stopper is replaced, the jug begins filling with gas and is ready again for use the next dawn.

item.name: Kettle of Drumming
entries: This item consists of an 18-inch-wide copper bowl with an animal skin stretched across the open end. When struck, the kettle drum makes a terrifying din. Each creature within 30 feet of you (not including you) must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute.
At the end of each of its turns, a creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
Once used, this property of the drum can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Key of Opening
entries: This bronze key has a head shaped like a crown. When inserted into a nonmagical lock and twisted, the key expends a charge and opens the lock. The key has {@dice 1d6 + 2} charges when found and becomes nonmagical when you use the last charge.

item.name: Ladle of Curing
entries: This ladle is made of sycamore and consists of a large turned bowl and an 18-inch handle with a hook end. When dipped into boiling water, it turns the contents of the bowl into a magical broth that, when completely consumed, cures {@condition blinded|PHB|blindness}, {@condition deafened|PHB|deafness}, and any diseases affecting the target. It takes an action to consume the broth.
Once used, this property of the ladle can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Lamp of Darkness
entries: This lamp is made from black iron and has shutters. It does not consume any oil. When you un-shutter the lamp, magical darkness spreads out from it to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for 10 minutes. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with {@sense darkvision} can't see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.
Once used, this property of the lamp can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Lamp of Djinni Summoning
entries: This brass oil lamp is engraved with palm leaves and always appears tarnished when found. When you rub the lamp, you summon a {@creature djinni|MM} from the Elemental Plane of Air. The {@creature djinni|MM} appears to emerge from the lamp spout as a stream of colorful smoke and materializes in the nearest unoccupied space.

The {@creature djinni|MM} remains with you for a maximum of 1 hour, or until it drops to 0 hit points. It then returns to its home plane. While summoned, the {@creature djinni|MM} is friendly to you and your companions. It obeys any commands you give it, no matter what language you use. If you fail to command it, the {@creature djinni|MM} defends itself against attackers but takes no other actions.
The {@creature djinni|MM} may be summoned up to three times. After the third summons, the lamp randomly teleports somewhere up to 1000 miles away.

item.name: Lamp of Honesty
entries: This item appears to be an ordinary lamp except it burns for just 10 minutes on a {@item Oil (flask)|PHB|flask of oil}. Once lit, any creature within 15 feet of it cannot speak a deliberate lie. A creature may choose not to speak. Once you have lit the lamp, it cannot be re-lit until the next dawn.

It may surprise you to learn that this item was first devised by Rary, who was a master of mental magic. Tenser considered him a mediocre wizard and gave him the nickname "Medium Rary." Rary had his revenge, and much strife followed.

item.name: Leaf of Colors
entries: This item appears to be an ordinary green leaf, freshly picked from a tree. You may command it to detect either a species of creature (such as goblins) or a type of creature (such as fiends or aberrations). If the leaf comes within 120 feet of the creature you specified, it turns yellow. If the leaf comes within 60 feet, it turns red. It returns to green once it is no longer within 120 feet of the creature. The leaf can only be attuned to detect one species or type of creature every 24 hours.

item.name: Leaf of Falling
entries: This charm is shaped like a small silver leaf. When you fall while wearing this charm, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling.
It is the rare adventurer who does not occasionally fall from a great height. This item is relatively simple to manufacture but is infinitely useful.

item.name: Lens of Lighting
entries: This small convex glass lens can focus even the dimmest amount of light (including moonlight) into a tiny point that lights any combustible material (such as paper, cloth, or wood).

item.name: Lens of Perspicacity
entries: This soft, clear lens fits over your eye. While wearing it, you can speak a command word, and for the next 10 minutes, you have {@sense truesight} out to 120 feet.
Once used, this property of the lens can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Libram of Evaluation
entries: This small book has an embossed leather cover and is filled with a comprehensive index of gemstones and art objects alongside the market value. This index is magically updated every day at dawn to reflect the latest prices. Any art object or gemstone you possess is listed in the book and can be found with 10 minutes of searching.

item.name: Libram of Identification
entries: This large book has a wood and leather cover, and thick pages of beautifully illuminated parchment. It can be used to identify any magic item. With 10 minutes searching, you can find an exact, illustrated match for the item you wish to identify. The entry includes all command words needed to use the item.
Once the libram is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn. Anyone attempting to use the libram before then is unable to find the item they seek.

item.name: Log of Burning
entries: This small log may be set on fire by uttering its command word. It is not consumed by the flames and continues to burn forever until it is doused.

item.name: Mask of Comedy
entries: This brightly painted mask depicts a face with a huge grin. When you use an action to don this mask, a creature of your choice that can see you and is within 30 feet of you must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature perceives you as hilariously funny and falls {@condition prone} in fits of laughter for 1 minute, becoming {@condition incapacitated} and unable to stand up for the duration. A creature with an Intelligence score of 4 or less isn't affected.

At the end of each of its turns, and each time it takes damage, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. The target has advantage on the saving throw if it's triggered by damage. On a success, the effect ends.
Once used, this property of the mask can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Mask of Disguise
entries: This mask is made of white plaster and depicts a face with holes for the eyes and mouth. When you use an action to don this mask, you make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different for 1 hour or until you use your action to take the mask off.

You can seem 2 feet shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between. You can't change your body type, so you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this item hold up to casual physical inspection. For example, if you use this item to add a hat to your outfit, anyone touching the hat believes that they feel it. However, anyone making a detailed physical inspection of your appearance and succeeding on a {@dc 15} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check discerns that you are magically disguised.
The disguise lasts up to 1 hour and the mask may be used as many times as you wish.

item.name: Mask of Tragedy
entries: This gray mask depicts a face with a frowning mouth and sad eyes. When you use an action to don this mask, a creature of your choice that can see you and is within 30 feet of you must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature is overcome by grief and falls {@condition prone} in a fit of wailing for 1 minute, becoming {@condition incapacitated} and unable to stand up for the duration. A creature with an Intelligence score of 4 or less isn't affected.

At the end of each of its turns, and each time it takes damage, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. The target has advantage on the saving throw if it's triggered by damage. On a success, the effect ends.
Once used, this property of the mask can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Medallion of Empathy
entries: This star-shaped silver medallion is engraved with the image of a heart held in a pair of hands. While wearing it, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks.

item.name: Medallion of Gargoyles
entries: This stone medallion is shaped like a grotesque head. While wearing this item, you can use your action to summon a pair of {@creature Gargoyle|MM|gargoyles} that emerge from a piece of stone that you can see within range. A {@creature gargoyle|MM} summoned by this amulet disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or after 1 hour.

The summoned {@creature Gargoyle|MM|gargoyles} are friendly to you and your companions. Roll initiative for them as a group, which has its own turns. They obey any verbal commands that you issue to them (no action required by you). If you don't issue any commands to them, they defend themselves from hostile creatures but otherwise take no actions.
Once the medallion is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Mirror of Divination
entries: While holding this silver hand mirror, you can ask a single question concerning a specific goal, event, or activity to occur within a tenday. A ghostly face appears in the mirror and offers a truthful reply, which might be a short phrase, a cryptic rhyme, or an omen. Once used, this property of the mirror can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Mirror of Images
entries: While holding this gold hand mirror, you can use an action to speak its command word and activate it. It remains activated until you use an action to speak the command word again.

Any creature other than you that sees its reflection in the activated mirror while within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be trapped, along with anything it is wearing or carrying, in the mirror. This saving throw is made with advantage if the creature knows the mirror's nature. While trapped in the mirror, the creature's reflection remains visible and can talk to those in the real world.
A creature trapped in the mirror doesn't age and doesn't need to eat, drink, or sleep. A creature trapped within the mirror can escape using magic that permits planar travel.

If the mirror already contains a creature when used to trap a new creature, the current occupant is freed to accommodate the new prisoner. A freed creature appears in an unoccupied space within sight of the mirror but facing away from it. If the mirror is shattered, any creature it contains is freed and appears in the nearest unoccupied space.

item.name: Mirror of Reading
entries: While holding this hand mirror, you can use an action to speak its command word and activate it. It remains activated for 1 hour, during which time you understand any written language that you see reflected in the mirror's surface. Once used, this property of the mirror can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Mirror of Recall
entries: Staring into this small hand mirror allows you to perfectly recall any conversation you have ever had, any sight you have ever seen, or any book you have ever read.

item.name: Mirror of Seeing
entries: While looking into this hand mirror, you can use your action to cast the {@spell scrying} spell (save {@dc 15}). While scrying this way, the images appear in the mirror. Once used, this property of the mirror can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Muzzle of Training
entries: This leather muzzle can be placed on any beast that has a snout, with the muzzle magically growing or shrinking to fit correctly. While a beast is wearing the muzzle, any {@skill Animal Handling} checks made against it have advantage.

item.name: Nail of Pointing
entries: This object appears to be a common carpentry nail. However, you can command the nail to point to any nonmagical object, and it will turn and point toward it for 1 hour. You must have previously seen the object or must have a detailed description of it. There is no limit to the nail's range, but the object must be on the same plane of existence. The nail can only be used to point at inanimate, non-magical objects. It can't point to living, undead, or constructed creatures.
Once the nail is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

I may be unusual in that I consider items such as this to be far more powerful than something like a necklace of fireballs or a wand of lightning bolts. Using this simple device, I've tracked down countless lost books and relics, and have thereby learned many forgotten secrets of the ancients.

item.name: Necklace of Glittering
entries: This item consists of a circular sapphire in an electrum setting, which hangs from a silver chain studded with tiny diamonds. It has 3 charges. You can use an action to expend a charge and cause the gem to fire a brilliant beam of light at one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
The necklace regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Needle of Mending
entries: While holding this item you can cast the {@spell mending} cantrip at will.

item.name: Net of Landing
entries: This item is a 3-foot-square mesh of fine copper wire. Anyone wrapping the net about themselves like a cloak takes no damage from falling and always lands upright.

item.name: Net of Snaring
entries: This item is a 5-foot-square mesh of shimmering, silver threads. You can use an action to throw the net at a Large or smaller creature you can see within 60 feet of you. Make a ranged attack roll with an attack bonus equal to your Dexterity modifier plus your proficiency bonus. On a hit, the target is {@condition restrained} until freed. The net has no effect on creatures that are formless, or creatures that are Huge or larger.

A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 20} Dexterity check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach from the net on a success. If the check fails, any further attempts made by that creature automatically fail until 24 hours have elapsed.
Once the net is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn. If thrown at a creature before then, it harmlessly slides off.

item.name: Nightcap of Vision
entries: Wearing this nightcap grants you {@sense darkvision}. You can see in {@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|dim light} within 60 feet as if it were {@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|bright light} and in darkness as if it were {@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|dim light}. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

item.name: Oars of Rowing
entries: These items look like regular boat oars and are usually found in pairs. When you attach these oars to the oarlocks of a boat, you can speak a command word and cause the oars to row the boat on their own at a speed of 2 miles per hour for up to 12 hours. Speaking the command word again causes the oars to cease rowing. Once used, this property of the oars can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Ointment of Soothing
entries: This stubby tin jar is 2 inches in diameter and contains {@dice 1d4 + 1} doses of a thick pink mixture that smells faintly of lavender. As an action, one dose of the ointment can be applied to the skin and it removes any {@condition exhaustion} you are suffering and cures any disease or poison affecting you.

item.name: Orb of Storms
entries: This small crystal sphere contains a boiling blue cloud. While holding the orb, you gain the following benefits:

items: You have resistance to lightning damage.
You can use an action to cast the {@spell control weather} spell. Once used, this property of the orb can't be used again until 15 days have passed.
You can use an action to cast the {@spell storm of vengeance} spell (save {@dc 15}). Once used, this property of the orb can't be used again until 15 days have passed.

entries: It should not surprise you to learn that this orb was originally designed by Otiluke, who was a connoisseur of such magical devices.

item.name: Parchment of Rolling
entries: This 8-inch-wide sheet of parchment is wrapped around two elaborately carved mahogany rollers. No matter how far you roll down, you never run out of fresh paper to write on and the thickness of the paper wrapped around the rollers never increases. It is an infinitely large piece of writing paper.

item.name: Periapt of the Sullen Seas
entries: This sea-blue gemstone is attached to a silver chain and quivers when worn as if it were a large drop of water. While wearing the item, you can speak a command word and then hold your breath for up to 12 hours. While holding your breath, being underwater imposes no penalties on your movement or attacks.
Once used, the periapt can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Pipe of Smoking
entries: This pipe is always magically full of fresh tobacco. When you use an action to light and puff on it, you create a 20-foot-radius sphere of thick grey smoke centered on yourself. The sphere spreads around corners, and its area is {@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|heavily obscured}. Each creature other than yourself that is completely within the smoke at the start of its turn must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature spends its action that turn retching and reeling. Creatures that don't need to breathe or are immune to poison automatically succeed on this saving throw.
The smoke lasts for one hour or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it. Once you have lit the pipe, it can't be lit again until the next dawn.
According to a persistent stereotype, wizards have a weakness for pipes. I cannot determine where this idea originated. I find the habit repellant, and I know Bigby shared my opinion.

item.name: Pole of Rescue
entries: This 5-foot-long pole is made of polished steel. When you speak the command word, a short silver thread appears attached to the end of the pole, with a 6-inch-wide silver hoop on the end of the thread. If you make a casting motion with the pole toward a creature you can see within 120 feet of you, the hoop flies unerringly toward the target with the thread magically lengthening. If the target, being of size medium or smaller and not magically {@condition restrained}, takes hold of the hoop, the thread begins retracting and drags the target toward you. Speaking the command word again causes the thread and hoop to disappear.
Once used, this property of the pole can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Portable Bridge
entries: When folded, this item is small enough to fit in your pocket. When unfolded as an action, it magically expands into a 5-foot-wide bridge of wooden planks, capable of spanning a 60-foot gap.

item.name: Pouch of Plenty
entries: This small brown leather pouch is embossed with the image of a bee. When you place up to 10 coins in the pouch and leave it closed until the following dawn, the coins are converted to the next higher metal. So copper coins become silver, silver coins become electrum, and so on. The pouch has no effect on platinum coins.

item.name: Pouch of Travelling
entries: This sturdy leather pouch weighs 20 pounds and is 10 inches square. Inside it are a {@item Two-Person Tent|PHB|tent}, a {@item bedroll|PHB}, a {@item mess kit|PHB}, a {@item tinderbox|PHB}, a {@item hooded lantern|PHB}, 10 days of {@item Rations (1 day)|PHB|rations}, 6 {@item iron spike|PHB|iron spikes}, a {@item crowbar|PHB}, a {@item waterskin|PHB}, and {@item Hempen Rope (50 feet)|PHB|50 feet of hempen rope}. All these items may be easily drawn out and replaced whenever required. If any additional item is placed in the pouch, it bursts and scatters the contents.

item.name: Quill of Forgery
entries: This appears to be an ordinary feather quill pen, but it can be used to imitate any handwriting. You must take a written sample of the handwriting to be copied, consisting of at least 10 words, and burn it before mixing the ashes with ink. When writing with that ink, your handwriting will perfectly match the sample for up to 500 words.
Once used, this property of the quill can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Quill of Necromancy
entries: This small black quill is made from a crow feather. When placed on the grave or corpse of any dead creature with a sheet of parchment, you can use an action to speak a command word to activate it. Once activated, you can ask the dead creature up to three questions, with the quill writing the answers on the parchment after each question. The corpse knows only what it knew in life, including the languages it knew. Answers are usually brief, cryptic, or repetitive.
Once used, this property of the quill can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Quill of Truth
entries: This large quill is made from the feather of a phoenix and has a nib of gold. It is not possible to write a deliberate lie using this quill. If you attempt to do so, the ink in the nib evaporates and the words cannot be formed on the page.

item.name: Rake of Smoothing
entries: When you drag this rake behind you, it perfectly obliterates all tracks and other traces of your passage. Having done this, you can't be tracked except by magical means.

item.name: Rake of Tracking
entries: You can use this item to rake over a 30-foot-square area, which takes 10 minutes. This has the effect of highlighting the tracks of any creatures that have recently passed through. All ability checks made to follow tracks in the area have advantage for the next 24 hours. Once you have used this property of the rake, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Rattle of Death
entries: This crimson wooden stick has a leering, skull-shaped rattle attached to one end. As an action, you can point and shake the rattle at one creature you can see within 60 feet. If the creature you choose has 100 hit points or fewer, it dies. Otherwise, there is no effect.
A humanoid killed by this item rises at the start of your next turn as a {@creature zombie|MM} that is permanently under your command, following your orders to the best of its ability.
Once used, the rattle can't be used again until the next dawn.
An object of remarkable and alarming potency, and few individuals in the multiverse can stand before it. I will not comment on rumors that I have such an object in my vaults.

item.name: Rattle of Elements
entries: When you shake this tin rattle, you call forth an elemental servant. Choose an area of air, earth, fire, or water that fills a 10-foot cube within range. An {@filter elemental of challenge rating 5 or lower|bestiary|source=|Challenge Rating=[&0;&5]|type=elemental|miscellaneous=} appropriate to the area you chose appears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet the area. For example, a {@creature fire elemental|MM} could emerge from a bonfire. The elemental disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or after 1 hour. The summoned creature is friendly to you and your companions and obeys any verbal commands that you issue to it.
Once you have used this property of the rattle, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Robe of Thunder
entries: This gray silk robe is printed with the image of boiling storm clouds. While wearing it, you have resistance to thunder damage.

As an action, you can speak its command word and you are surrounded by an invisible, faintly rumbling aura for 1 minute. When you take damage from a creature that is within 5 feet of you, the aura inflicts {@damage 2d6} points of thunder damage on your attacker.
Once used, this property of the robe can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Rudder of Guidance
entries: This magical rudder will grow or shrink to fit the ship or boat it is attached to. Once installed, the pilot of the vessel will always know, with perfect accuracy, the direction of any port they have previously visited.

item.name: Sandals of the Light Step
entries: These superbly crafted sandals are made of fine green leather with mithral buckles and are designed to resemble overlapping leaves. While wearing them, you increase your walking speed by 10 feet and your movement is unaffected by {@quickref difficult terrain|PHB|3}.

You can also use an action to speak a command word and, for 1 hour, you can stand on and move across any liquid surface as if it were solid ground. Once used, this property of the sandals can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Saw of Cutting
entries: This is a regular hand saw and is about 2 feet long. As an action, you can speak the saw's command word and for the next 10 minutes you can use the saw to cut through any non-magical wood, metal, or stone, at the rate of 1 foot per minute. Once used, this property of the saw can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Scepter of Light
entries: This short, gold-plated rod is capped by a clear crystal orb. As an action, you can speak the scepter's command word and, for the next 4 hours, a 60-foot-radius sphere of {@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|bright light} spreads out from the orb. {@quickref Vision and Light|PHB|2|0|Dim light} is shed for an additional 60 feet. If any of this light area overlaps with an area of darkness created by a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell that created the darkness is dispelled.
Once used, this property of the scepter can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Screaming Lantern
entries: This brass lantern has shutters. When the shutters are opened, no light is emitted, but an ear-splitting scream comes from the lantern and continues until the shutters are closed. Any creature that can hear and starts its turn within 20 feet of the lantern while the lantern screams takes {@damage 1} point of thunder damage.

item.name: Scrimshaw Hand Mirror
entries: This ornate mirror, carved from knucklehead trout ivory, has a peculiar silver surface. While holding this mirror, you can use a bonus action to activate it. The mirror's surface ripples briefly, and, for 1 hour, you see a faint aura around any reflected magic item.
Once used, this property of the mirror can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Scroll of Writing
entries: This scroll is made of paper and is wrapped around a wooden roller. Any words spoken by the owner of this item magically appear written on the paper. If a length of paper is torn from the scroll, the writing remains on it and it behaves exactly like a regular piece of paper. No matter how many sheets are torn from the scroll, it never runs out of paper.

item.name: Seeds of Growth
entries: These are usually found in a small canvas bag containing {@dice 2d4} seeds. As an action, you can throw a seed at a point you can see within 20 feet of you, and a large tangled bush, 10 feet in diameter, immediately sprouts from the ground there. This bush turns the ground into {@quickref difficult terrain|PHB|3} for 1 minute before wilting away.

A creature that ends its turn in the area of the bush must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the bush. A creature so {@condition restrained} can use its action to make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a success, it frees itself.

item.name: Seeds of Wealth
entries: These resemble the seeds of a beech tree, but when planted they grow into a tree that bears coins instead of fruit. This takes six months from planting. The tree bears one harvest of fruit only, consisting of {@dice 20d20} coins.
Roll on the following table to determine what type of coin the tree bears:

item.name: Shovel of Animation
entries: This item looks like an ordinary shovel with a 4-foot-long wooden shaft and a blade of iron. However, when used by moonlight to exhume a corpse, the corpse becomes a {@creature zombie|MM}. You can reanimate a maximum of 6 corpses in one night using this item. The corpses must have been buried in the ground, not simply covered over with rocks or dirt.

On each of your turns, you can use a bonus action to mentally command the {@creature zombie|MM} so long as the creature is within 60 feet of you (if you control multiple creatures, you can command any or all of them at the same time, issuing the same command to each one). If you issue no commands, the {@creature zombie|MM} only defends itself against hostile creatures.
The {@creature zombie|MM} is under your control for 24 hours, after which time it reverts to a corpse. It cannot be reanimated unless it is buried again and re-exhumed.

There is some debate around the ethics of using necromantic magic such as this. I care nothing for such frivolous discussions. Magic is neither good nor evil, it simply is. My only consideration is whether a particular spell or item will enhance the Balance or diminish it.

item.name: Shovel of Digging
entries: This item looks like an ordinary shovel with a 4-foot-long wooden shaft and a blade of iron. When you speak its command word, it begins digging by itself at the rate of 10 cubic feet per minute. The shovel can only dig soil or sand and digs for a maximum of 4 hours per day.

item.name: Slate of Identification
entries: This is a 12-by-6-inch piece of black slate in a lavish wooden frame. When you touch it to a magic item and say "Identify," the magical properties of the item are neatly printed out on the slate in chalk, including any required command words. Once used, this property of the slate can't be used again until the next dawn. Touching a nonmagical item has no effect.

item.name: Snuffer of Dousing
entries: This thin silver-plated rod is 6 inches long and has a small cup attached to one end. When you use it to douse a candle, all non-magical fires within a 20-foot radius are also extinguished. Once used, this property of the snuffer can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Snuffer of Serving
entries: This ornately engraved brass rod is 8 inches long and has a small cup attached to one end. When you use it to douse a candle, eight {@creature smoke mephit|MM|smoke mephits} immediately emerge from the smouldering wick.

The summoned {@creature smoke mephit|MM|mephits} are friendly to you and your companions. Roll initiative for the {@creature smoke mephit|MM|mephits} as a group, which has its own turns. They obey any verbal commands that you issue to them (no action required by you). If you don't issue any commands to them, they defend themselves from hostile creatures but otherwise take no actions.
Once used, this property of the snuffer can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Soap of True Washing
entries: This small bar of soap is translucent blue in color. When you wash yourself with this soap, it cures any diseases affecting you and causes one curse affecting you to end. The soap is completely consumed in the process.

item.name: Spoon of Magic Medicine
entries: When you place this delicate silver spoon in your mouth, it immediately fills with thick, sweet syrup. Upon swallowing this magic medicine, you regain all your hit points, your {@condition exhaustion} level is reduced by one, and you are cured of {@condition blinded|PHB|blindness}, {@condition deafened|PHB|deafness}, and any diseases affecting you. It also causes all curses affecting you to end.
Once you have used this property of the spoon, it can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Stormfire Amulet
entries: This item consists of a flame-shaped electrum pendant set with a large fire opal. While wearing this amulet, you gain immunity to fire damage.
The amulet has 3 charges. You can use an action to expend one charge and cast the {@spell fire storm} spell. The amulet regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.
Another very powerful item, with much potential to disrupt the Balance. Perhaps we are better off destroying such as this—I am torn on the matter.

item.name: String of Lashing
entries: This item consists of a 4-inch piece of black twine tied to a small wooden peg. While holding this item, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to transform into a {@item +1 whip|DMG}. Speaking the command word again causes it to revert to string form.

item.name: String of Pearls
entries: When found, this 6-inch length of white twine has {@dice 1d6 + 1} luminous white pearls strung upon it. As an action, you can remove a pearl from the string and throw it at a creature you can see within 20 feet of you. The pearl disappears in a small flash, and the creature must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, roll on the following table to determine the effect:

rows: Whenever the target makes an attack roll or a saving throw, the target must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw. The effect lasts for 1 minute.
The target takes {@damage 3d6} psychic damage and must immediately use its reaction, if available, to move as far as its speed allows away from you.

The target falls into fits of laughter and falls {@condition prone}, becoming {@condition incapacitated} and unable to stand up for 1 minute. A creature with an Intelligence score of 4 or less isn't affected. At the end of each of its turns, and each time it takes damage, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. The target has advantage on the saving throw if it's triggered by damage. On a success, the effect ends.
If the target has 30 hit points or less, it falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute, until it takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake.
If the target is humanoid, it is {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the effect ends on the target.
The target is {@condition charmed} by you and regards you as a friendly acquaintance for 1 minute or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it.

item.name: String of Shackling
entries: This piece of woven flax is 3 feet long. If tied about the wrists of a creature that is {@condition incapacitated}, that creature cannot break or untie the string except with a {@spell wish}, though any other creature may do so with ease. If the string is cut or broken it loses its magic.

item.name: String of Warding
entries: This piece of strong, silvery twine is roughly 30 feet long and has the ends tied together. When placed on the ground in a circular shape, you can use an action to speak the command word and a 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy rises from the string.

Choose one of the following types of creatures: celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead. Creatures of the affected type can't willingly enter or leave the cylinder by nonmagical means. If the creature tries to use teleportation or interplanar travel to do so, it must first succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw.
The magical cylinder lasts for 1 hour or until you speak the command word again. Once used, the string can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Talisman of Exemplary Healing
item.reqAttune: by a bard, cleric, druid, paladin, or ranger
entries: This circular talisman is made of silver and inset with small diamonds in the shape of a triangle. While wearing it, you can use a bonus action to expend a charge and maximize the number of hit points regained when casting a healing spell using a spell slot of 6th or lower level. The talisman has 3 charges that are replenished every day at dawn.

item.name: Tent of Luxury
entries: This appears to be an ordinary canvas {@item two-person tent|PHB}. When you speak the command word, it pitches itself, and when you speak the command word again, it packs itself back up.

While pitched, the interior of the tent is an extradimensional space that is 40 feet square. It contains fine silken beds, a small bathroom area, and a long table laden with a hearty feast. There is enough accommodation and food for 8 people, and the feast replenishes itself daily.
The tent has AC 14 and 40 hit points. If it is destroyed, the contents of the tent are scattered around a 40-foot-radius area.

item.name: Tent of Warning
entries: This appears to be an ordinary canvas {@item two-person tent|PHB}. When you pitch the tent and speak the command word, the tent produces the sound of a hand bell for 10 seconds whenever a small or larger creature comes within 100 feet of the tent. When you speak the command word, you can designate creatures that won't set off the alarm. Packing up the tent cancels the effect.

item.name: Troll Gut Rope
entries: This 50-foot-long rope is woven from wet, rubbery troll intestines and is very pungent. You can command this rope to grow to any length up to 350 feet, and it reverts to its original length after 12 hours.

item.name: Twisted Claw
entries: This small silver sculpture is shaped like a twisted beast's claw. You can use your action to point the claw at a target you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition incapacitated} with excruciating pain for 1 minute on a failed save.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Constitution saving throw. On a success, the effect ends on the target. Once used, the claw can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Unicorn Pendant
entries: This pendant is made from pure gold and is shaped like the head of a unicorn. While wearing this item, you are immune to being {@condition charmed}, {@condition paralyzed}, or {@condition poisoned}, and you have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The pendant has 10 charges. While wearing it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells: {@spell teleport} (7 charges), {@spell dispel evil and good} (5 charges), {@spell protection from energy} (3 charges), or {@spell cure wounds} (1 charge).
The pendant regains {@dice 1d8 + 2} charges daily at dawn.

I have been called both "good" and "evil" so many times that the labels barely mean anything to me. Still, if any creature in the multiverse is pure, innocent, and noble, it is a unicorn. And even a unicorn can disrupt the Balance.

item.name: Urn of Purification
entries: This copper urn holds up to 5 gallons of liquid. If you fill it with any sort of drink and replace the lid, after 1 hour, the drink is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

item.name: Vampire Torc
entries: A blood-red ruby is embedded in this black iron torc. When you hit with a melee attack while wearing this item, you regain hit points equal to half the amount of damage dealt, to a maximum of 20 hit points per round.
While wearing the torc, you take 20 radiant damage when you start your turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

item.name: Vest of Missile Protection
entries: While wearing this black damask vest, you have resistance to damage from ranged weapon attacks.

item.name: Vestments of Power
entries: These religious garments are made from fine linen and embroidered with purple, scarlet, and golden thread. You gain these benefits while wearing them:

items: Your spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and AC each increase by 2.
You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
When you fall, you descend 60 feet per round and take no damage from falling.
You have resistance to fire damage.
You can stand on and move across any liquid surface as if it were solid ground.

item.name: Water Cloak
entries: This cloak is made of black sailcloth and appears to be soaking wet, but it feels warm and dry to the wearer. Upon donning the cloak, you gain resistance to fire damage, and you can also, as an action, extinguish any non-magical flame that you can see within 60 feet and that fits within a 5-foot cube.

You can also use a reaction to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell that inflicts fire damage. Provided the creature is casting a {@filter spell of 3rd level or lower|spells|source=|level=0;1;2;3|damage type=fire}, the spell fails and has no effect. Once used, this property of the cloak can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Wax of Fabrication
entries: When found, this item is a 6-inch cube of pale, pliable wax. When you mold the wax and speak the command word, you can transform it into a single nonliving object of wood, stone, crystal, or metal. The object may be any shape you choose but must be of the same volume as the wax or smaller and must be of a form that you have seen before.

The object exists for only a limited duration before reverting to a block of wax. The duration depends upon the material created. If the object is composed of multiple materials, use the shortest duration.
The entire block of wax must be used for the magical transformation to take place. Once used, the wax can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Wax of Hearing
entries: This tin container, 2 inches in diameter, contains {@dice 1d6 + 1} applications of pale wax. As an action, you can take one application of the wax, roll it into two small balls, and insert them into your ears. This enables you to create an {@condition invisible} sensor in a location up to a mile away that you have visited or seen before. The sensor remains in place for 1 hour, and it can't be attacked or otherwise interacted with. You can hear through the sensor as if you were in its space.
The used wax becomes nonmagical once the hour has elapsed.

item.name: Wheel of Burning
entries: This wheel is 2 inches in diameter and constructed from black iron. If you place it on the ground and use an action to speak its command word, a ringed wall of fire appears, 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, 1 foot thick, with the wheel at the center. The wall is opaque and lasts for one minute.

Any creature that enters the wall or ends its turn there must make a {@homebrew {@dc 15}|{@note No DC was given, most other items in the book use 15 as the standard check.}} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 5d8} fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.
Once used, the wheel can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Wheel of Flying
entries: This wheel is about 1 foot in diameter and constructed from polished wood. While holding it in both hands, you can use an action to speak its command word and gain a flying speed of 60 feet for 1 hour. You must keep both hands on the wheel for the duration or the effect ends. Once used, the wheel can't be used again until the next dawn.

I think the inspiration for this device may have been taken from a peculiar world I visit from time to time. Real magic is rare there, while gnome-like gadgetry is very advanced indeed. In this place, they use wheels to control steel vehicles, some of which traverse the land, some the water, and others the air.

item.name: Whistle of Beasts
entries: When you blow this tin whistle, you summon fey spirits that take the form of beasts and appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range. Roll on the following table to determine what appears:

Each beast is also considered fey, and it disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or after an hour. The summoned creatures are friendly to you and your companions, and they obey any verbal commands that you issue to them.
Once used, this property of the whistle can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Whistle of Stopping
entries: When you blow this silver whistle, choose a humanoid that you can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for one minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the effect ends on the target.
Once used, this property of the whistle can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: White Cloak of the Spider
entries: This white velvet cloak is embroidered with the image of a large black spider sitting in a web. While wearing it, you gain the following benefits:

items: You have resistance to poison damage.
You can use an action to cast the {@spell spider climb} spell. Once used, this property of the cloak can't be used again until the next dawn.
You can use an action to cast the {@spell hold person} spell (save {@dc 13}). Once used, this property of the cloak can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Wink Brooch
entries: A ruby engraved with a winking face is set at the head of this silver pin. While wearing the pin, you gain proficiency in the {@skill Persuasion} skill, and you double your proficiency bonus on checks made with that skill.

item.name: Wrestling Oil
entries: This brass canister has a swirling pattern engraved upon it and contains {@dice 1d4 + 1} doses of a thick, sticky, translucent mixture. As an action, one dose of the oil can be applied to your skin. You then have advantage on any ability check you make to escape a {@action grapple} for 1 hour.

item.name: Xylophone of Xenomorphy
entries: This item comprises a wooden mallet and three small wooden bars affixed to a frame. If you use an action to strike the wooden bars, you may transform a creature you can see within 60 feet into a hideous new form. An unwilling creature must make a successful {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw to avoid the effect.

The transformation lasts for 1 hour. The new form can be any aberration whose challenge rating is equal to or less than the target's challenge rating or level. The target's game statistics, including mental ability scores, are replaced by the statistics of the chosen aberration. It retains its alignment and personality.

The target assumes the hit points of its new form. When it reverts to its normal form, the creature returns to the number of hit points it had before transforming. The creature is limited in the actions it can perform by the nature of its new form, and it can't speak, cast spells, or take any other action that requires hands or speech. The target's gear melds into the new form. The creature can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment.
Once used, this property of the xylophone can't be used again until the next dawn.
Alliteration is not a sound basis on which to conduct serious magical research. The Balance is left in tatters due to nonsense such as this.

item.name: Yoke of Flight
entries: When this double yoke is used to harness a pair of horses, they gain a flying speed of 60 feet and can also pull a carriage through the air.

item.name: Yoke of Obedience
entries: This yoke is made of soft leather and fits comfortably over the head. If you place the yoke on a sleeping humanoid, that creature is {@condition charmed} by you for an hour upon waking. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature regards you as its trusted leader. If harmed by you or your companions, or commanded to do something contrary to its nature, the target ceases to be {@condition charmed} in this way. Once used, this property of the yoke can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Zoster of Zeal
entries: This is a wide leather belt covered in bronze plates. You can use an action to don this item, and you gain a +2 bonus to all attack and damage rolls for 1 minute. Once used, the zoster can't be used again until the next dawn.

Perhaps it is fitting that we end this catalog with zeal, for I concede I possess the zeal of a convert. Having spent my youth in pursuit of power, I am now zealous for the Balance. Consideration of it dominates my waking thoughts.

Many have suggested that I should seek out the Good instead. In my experience, the word has been relativized into meaninglessness, and is often a cipher for mere tribalism and prejudice, while other times it describes a banal sentimentalism. I have no use for these.

Others have suggested that I ought to be a champion of Law. But I have been to Mechanus and seen a million machines march in lockstep, with not an original thought between them. This is not the future I wish.
No, our world depends upon all these things and more, upon a vivacious mix of the opposing, the contrary, and the contradictory. This is the Balance, and this is what I have pledged to uphold.
